CustomField.description: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
CustomField.formula: IF( AND (Terminal_Stage__c, ISBLANK( Next_Step__c )) , null, (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( EndTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(EndTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( InitialTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(InitialTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
CustomField.label: Handle Time (Weekdays in this Step)
